GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/article_id.description: serves a specific article when a numerical value is entered

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments from a particular article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a comment to a specific article ID
